mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Appointment (appointment_id, patient_id, provider_id, `date`, appoint_time,status) VALUES (uuid(), #{patientId}, #{providerId}, #{date}, #{appointTime}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, provider_id, `date`, appoint_time, status, create_time, update_time FROM Appointment WHERE patient_id = #{patientId} ORDER BY start_time DESC
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, provider_id, `date`, appoint_time, status, create_time, update_time FROM Appointment WHERE provider_id = #{doctorId} ORDER BY start_time DESC
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, provider_id, `date`, appoint_time, status, create_time, update_time FROM Appointment WHERE appointment_id = #{appointmentId}

SELECT a.* FROM Appointment a LEFT JOIN Patient p ON a.patient_id = p.user_id LEFT JOIN User u ON a.patient_id = u.user_id WHERE a.provider_id = #{providerId} AND ( u.first_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR u.last_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR p.patient_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') )
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, provider_id, `date`, appoint_time, status, create_time, update_time FROM Appointment WHERE provider_id = #{providerId} AND `date` = #{date}
